txt.en: The Great Goblin's forces are approaching, and will soon clash with those of the hobgoblin warlord.
Instance: Revenge of the Great Goblin
The Great Goblin's forces are approaching.\n\nYou should talk to Skalla.
The Great Goblin's forces are approaching. The Warlord's host lies in wait. Battle will soon erupt. All we can do now is watch, and hope they fall upon each other's spears.
'An unexpected outcome! That goblin has earned some respect from me.'
The battle has been won!\n\nYou should talk to Langhár.
'But there are still too many goblins alive for us to defeat on our own. This may be a problem.'
'Langhár! What is she doing? She will get herself killed! Wait... is that?'
'We received word that the Great Goblin and his host are on the move and will arrive soon! Ready yourself; this may be messy.'
'Finally crawled out of your hole, Marbrog? If you seek war, you shall have it!'
'I accept your challenge. For the Herald of Winter!'
'What a battle! Those goblin fools did not expect a visit from a Great Eagle! Haha!\n\n'Let us return to Vegbár. I could use a hot meal and a stiff drink!'
'Move, you cretins! Goblin-town will be mine again, or you will all die trying!'
'You think you're better than me, hobgoblin? Let's do this, one-on-one! Come and find out how a Great Goblin fights!'
'Take that, you massive brutes! Size isn't everything!'
'The Beornings have returned for your heads, green-skins! For Waldfast!'
'Yes, crawl back into that pit you call home, worms! This is our land!'
